title: Ticket #1826: schedd SOAP code cancels timers twice
description:
I noticed that when soap transactions are committed or aborted, there is a message in the logs like this: 

Timer 4403 not found

The problem is that the transaction timeout timer is canceled both in ScheddTransaction::~ScheddTransaction() and in the functions that handle closure of the transaction: condor__commitTransaction() and condor__abortTransaction().

I'm not aware of a case where this could lead to incorrect behavior, but it is generally something we should avoid.
check_ins:
2010-Dec-27 17:01   Check-in [25829]: Documented bug fix for SOAP "Timer X not found" bug. #1826 (By Dan Bradley )
2010-Dec-27 16:55   Check-in [19800]: Fixed soap transaction timeout timer cleanup in the schedd. #1826 The timer was being canceled twice. (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
